Master of Public Policy and Administration
Required Documents

  1. Transcripts
  2. 2 letters of reference
  3. Statement of intent: the 1-page, single-spaced outline of the academic or professional experience, personal and professional goals, and how MPPA will build on that experience in order to help you reach those goals.
  4. Resume: education, professional experience, volunteer activities, and noteworthy achievements.
